attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Gulian has been at Langley Grammar School for the past 40 years. His mother died before he was born and he has been fighting breast cancer for the past 7 years. He was brought up on the harsh streets of Southall and he has worked his way up to Science Teacher of the Year. He has inspired many hundreds who come to the school with his tale of hardship.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
